glsa.title: CEDET: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in CEDET could result in privilege escalation.

background.p: CEDET is a Collection of Emacs Development Environment Tools written with the end goal of creating an advanced development environment in Emacs.

description.p: An untrusted search path vulnerability was discovered in CEDET.

impact.p: A local attacker could escalate his privileges via a specially crafted Lisp expression in a Project.ede file in the directory or a parent directory of an opened file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All CEDET users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since February 01, 2012. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
